https://tmrev.io/movie/342737-20th Century Women 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mso2rEr9i0MilRIOao5HaWFipS9.jpg In 1979 Santa Barbara, California, Dorothea Fields is a determined single mother in her mid-50s who is raising her adolescent son, Jamie, at a moment brimming with cultural change and rebellion. Dorothea enlists the help of two younger women – Abbie, a free-spirited punk artist living as a boarder in the Fields' home and Julie, a savvy and provocative teenage neighbour – to help with Jamie's upbringing. 20th Century Women
